Hiya mate, hope your good!

I've been using the techniques you've suggested, just on different work on a small scale to practice, I feel like I should have been at the stage I'm at now a year ago haha. 

I've come across hair and not on a green screen. The way I've approached it is using a difference matte by grabbing a plate and using that.

I've fiddled with the difference matte as best I could and it's okay at best so I've roto'd the head & neck (only 25 frames this time haha) to clean those parts up... 

Now using the open spline tool for the individual outlying hairs to clean them up a bit. 

Just wondering, how do you approach hair for roto? If there's no green screen
